definitions: an abrupt swerving movement of the whole body, used as a tactic to avoid contact or collision

examples.text: he beat the goalkeeper with a body swerve before scoring with a well-executed shot from a difficult angle

shortDefinitions: abrupt swerving movement of whole body

definitions: an act of avoiding or evading someone or something

examples.text: most of the big-time golfers made their excuses and gave the event a body swerve

shortDefinitions: act of avoiding someone or something

definitions: make an abrupt swerving movement of the whole body in order to avoid contact or collision

examples.text: I grabbed my coat, body-swerved round the chair and bolted

shortDefinitions: make abrupt swerving movement to avoid contact

examples.text: he advises the squeamish to body-swerve the food markets
Harte opted to body-swerve the question
